entry.title: Who Are We
entry.content:
Welcome to Shi Lab! My name is Yingchao Shi.

What we have done

My first research was to develop a novel paradigm for the generation of vascularized organoids (vOrganoids) consisting of typical human cortical cell types and a vascular structure as a vascularized and functional brain organoid model. It was published on 2020 and considered to be one of the pioneering works in vOrganoids in China.

My second research was to characterize the emergence of cell diversity in the human ganglionic eminences(GE). Characterizing the developmental trajectories of distinct types of cortical interneuron in humans seems increasingly important, especially considering the involvement of interneuron dysfunction in neurodevelopmental disorders.

My third research was to provide a comprehensive spatial and temporal atlas of embryonic spinal cord. It symbolized the beginning of my lab.

What we will do

What we can do

entry.content:
Congradulations!

The work of vOrganoid was published on PLOS Biology!
